turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good. How are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thanks for asking. How can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks did you want to pickup from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at Ford Roush, Michigan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what cross street is there for that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I believe 25th Avenue is what it's on. I'm not entirely sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No worries, I found it. And what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a grande caffe Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any syrup or whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, with cream and chocolate syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and what milk did you want in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a grande caffe americano with, 2%, whipped cream, and chocolate syrup from the starbucks on 24th Avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you're all set, the order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get your reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a good one.
